outputs.output_descr:
The objectives of the Capacity Development Project for Disaster Risk Management are as follows:
1) The improvement of the Disaster Risk Management policies, strategies and opeartaions for Trinidad and Tobago.
2) The establishment of a functioning national emergency communication system.

project_descr: Capacity Development for Disaster Risk Management  in Trinidad and Tobago
project_title: Capacity Development for Disaster Risk Management
